betterquesting:10.desc:8:
After spending time in this place, I feel changed, different, mutated...
My perception of the world around me has changed, as if I am just now noticing things that had always been there.
Maybe it is the things I have witnessed here, maybe it is just my experiences until now, but what I feel is undeniable. An epiphany, of some sort.
It is not that I feel stronger, but my grasp on power seems more steady, and I seem to undertand more of the power around myself; the field or Recursion has never been more evident.
